definition: Sports and recreational activities performed on snow or ice during cold weather conditions.

positive_examples: The Olympic figure skating competition was breathtaking to watch.
We went skiing in the Alps during our winter vacation.
The curling team practiced their sweeping technique on the ice rink.
Ice skating lessons help children develop balance and coordination.
The ski resort opened early due to excellent snow conditions.
She performed a perfect triple axel during her figure skating routine.
negative_examples: The swimming competition was held at the indoor pool.
He scored three goals during the hockey game.
The tennis match was postponed due to rain.
Beach volleyball requires excellent teamwork and communication.
The basketball team practiced free throws in the gymnasium.
She ran a marathon through the city streets last weekend.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: WaterSports, TeamSports, TrackAndField, BallSports, CombatSports
